title: Sketchbook Folio, "St. Anthony and the Hermits, Study after Lodovico Carracci", ca. 1809–18
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower margin: 23 Lodovico Caracci Bologna
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Group of nine figures, four seated, three whose heads alone are seen, most looking left. In distance, small shrine on hill.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "St. Anthony and the Hermits, Study after Lodovico Carracci", ca. 1809–18.
ca. 1809–18. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3493.
